rule: Each part of speech tag in the response may not exactly match one of the tags listed in the predefined list and may have alterations in spelling, case, or punctuation.
output:
Sentence: grammatical determiner (DT) tag and verb conjugation form (VB - base form)
Word: determiner/verb tag

 Sentence: the, conjunction (CC)
Word: unknown

 Sentence: I know not, interjection (UH)
Word: Unknown
complianceText:
The chatbot's output includes additional explanations and multiple tags where only a single tag should be returned. It also provides sentences and words instead of just the part-of-speech tag.
ERR
